intro: Welcome! I am Chinh - Fullstack Web Developer
careerObjective: As a full-stack web developer with approximately 2 years of experience, I have been involved in projects using Node.js, NestJS, React, MongoDB, and PostgreSQL. My Japanese proficiency is at the JLPT N2 level (most recent test score: 83/180), enabling me to understand technical documents. I aim to build a long-term career in Japan, gaining experience as a system engineer while learning Japanese development processes and communication styles.
